name: react-component-editor
description: A full-stack React component editor with Monaco integration

scripts.backend:db:setup: cd backend && pnpm run db:push && pnpm run db:generate
scripts.backend:db:reset: cd backend && docker compose down -v && docker compose up -d && sleep 10 && pnpm run db:push
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.build: cd backend && pnpm run build && cd ../frontend && pnpm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && pnpm run start" "cd frontend && pnpm run preview"
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules

author: akshayaparida
